text: The Isoko people are an ethnic group in southern Nigeria in Delta State. The Isoko people speak the Isoko language. ==Notable people== * Cornelius Adam Igbudu (1914-1981), founder of the Anglican Adam Preaching Society * Evi Edna Ogholi, Nigerian female reggae musician * Sunny Ofehe, environmental rights activist Category:Ethnic groups in Nigeria
title: Isoko people
